content: MT-AB-LL2 45 OC 45-degree angle bracket 45-degree angle bracket for bracing MT-40 and MT-50 strut channel structures, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Engineering and calculation service available – your local Hilti Engineers can provide advice and calculation services on more complex projects Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Applications Creating a rigid, 45-degree connection between two MT-45 or MT-50 strut channels Lateral bracing of lightweight metal framing and MEP support structures Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2273585 - Angle brace MT-AB-LL2 45 OC - Package Size 10 pc
